name: Balloon (itch) (SnakeWinter)
description:
Controls: Mouse, Space, Escape, and the game will tell you when to use 1 or 2. One section requires you to mouse-hover over a character to continue.

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: 

https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

I can't find the online link for some of the makehuman assets, but here are the ones I used and some similar ones by the creator of the missing ones:

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/clothes/ballet_tights.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/clothes/fhair01.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/clothes/eyes_real_pupil_no_cornea.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/clothes/mind_eyebrows_09.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/skin/light_skin_with_natural_makeup.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/clothes/harvey_female_scrubbottoms2.html

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/content/harvey_pskirt01_alternate_material.htm...

http://www.makehumancommunity.org/content/male_casual_suit_01_white_shirt.html

This game was worked on from February 17 - February 26, 2023.
